article_title: More notice of protests would help police, MPs say
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  says  that  at  least  29,782  people,  mostly  women  and  children,  have  been  killed  since  the  war  began  in  October.

article_title: More notice of protests would help police, MPs say
sentence: Israel's  military  offensive  was  triggered  by  Hamas's  unprecedented  attack  on  7  October  in  which  gunmen  killed  about  1,200  people  -  mainly  civilians  -  and  took  253  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.
